How can I use the `listbanned` command to list all banned IPs/Subnets in Verus using the JSON-RPC API?

You can use the `listbanned` command to list all banned IPs/Subnets in Verus by sending a JSON-RPC request to the Verus daemon. Here is an example of how to do this using the `curl` command:

```
curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "listbanned", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
```

Note: You need to replace `myusername` with your actual username.

listbanned List all banned IPs/Subnets. Examples: > verus listbanned > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "listbanned", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
